text: LaTavia Marie Roberson (born November 1, 1981) is an American singer and songwriter. She started the girl band Destiny's Child with Beyonc√© Knowles in 1990. She was a member until 2000. ==Personal life== In August 2013 Roberson gave birth to a baby girl. ==References== Category:1981 births Category:African-American singers Category:Singers from Houston Category:Destiny's Child members Category:Living people Category:American Grammy Award winners
title: LaTavia Roberson
